title: Banner of Elbereth (6U14)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Possession • Hand Weapon
Game Text:	Bearer must be an Elf companion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may draw a card. Response: If bearer wins a skirmish, discard this possession to liberate a site.
Lore:	”'First name the four, the free peoples: / Eldest of all, the elf-children…'”
Rarity:	U
